heading: How widespread is children poverty across all EU countries?
subheading: In 2024, 24.2% of children aged less than 18 in the EU were at risk of poverty or social exclusion compared with 24.9% reported in 2023.
tooltip1: of population aged less than 18 years
textNote: This map presents statistical data on the situation of children (aged less than 18 years) in the European Union (EU) who were at risk of poverty or social exclusion (AROPE) in 2022
